title: Question for a rioter
body:
I recently came across the imaqtpie announcer pack, and it's really funny and honestly helps me to not tilt. I was just wondering, can i get banned for using this?

Thanks.

replies.body:
I can't specifically say what modifications are okay and what aren't, especially is a program is involved, since we don't develop programs that make these changes. As with any modification to your game files, we don't officially support it, so attempting to do so is **at your own risk**. 

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
